# Weyrich23

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of Weyrich23 is to provide the code used for the manuscript XXX.
For the full datasets please contact the corresponding author. 
To explore the script you can use the trimmed dataset available with the package.
This package is not designed for general usage.

## Installation

You can install the development version of Weyrich23 like so:

``` r
library(remotes)
remotes::install_github()
```

## Example

The script for the analysis is available as a vignette and can be access as
follow:

```{r example}
library(Weyrich23)
browseVignettes(package = "Weyrich23")
```

The code for the functions used for the analysis is available
